data.title: Niantic, Inc.: Life
data.meta_description: Niantic, Inc. | 98,538 followers on LinkedIn. Building technologies and ideas that move us as the leaders in Augmented Reality | Niantic inspires people to explore the world, together. Our mission is to use emerging augmented reality (AR) technology to enrich our experiences as human beings in the physical world. Originally formed at Google in 2011, we are now an independent company with a strong group of investors including Nintendo, The Pok√©mon Company, and Alsop Louie Partners.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.
